Templates.title: Template configuration file for HSCI DMS 6.0 Draft A

ChangeHistory.p: Version 16 - updated for Information Standards Data Set changes
Version 15 - WithdrawalNoticeAcceptResponse (COMT_RM020000GB01) and Withdrawal Notice Reject Response (COMT_MT020001GB01) included

Version 14 - Corrected NPFIT-000026#Role, as parent model:COCD_TP145215GB01 is not referenced within the template constraint and corrected NPFIT-000028#Role as parent model:COCD_TP145215GB01 is not referenced within the template constraint. New parent models (COMT_MT000013GB02, COMT_MT000014GB02 ) added to the constraints: NPFIT-100022#Role, NPFIT-F#Role, NPFIT-100030#Role and NPFIT-100021#Role. New parent model of COMT_MT000005UK03 added to NPFIT-000027#Role. See Template configuration file for nullification specific constraints and templates. To support a complete uplift of the HDN/ HSCI messaging as impacted against the 2014 Care Act all SDS role templates MUST be removed from the HSCI DMS.
Version 13 - Nullification constraints and templates removed from this version. See Template configuration file for nullification specific constraints and templates
Version 12 - Agreed updates added to this version post HSCI DMIM 3.0 DRAFT release supplier review and comments
Version 11
HSCI Phase 2 (HDN) and Phase 3 (CHC) artefacts assigned to own Domains
Template parentModel cleaned up
Version 10
Universal templates added to HSCI domain
Addition of Nullification Domain
Addition of HSCI Phase 3 (CHC) artefacts to HSC Domain
Version 9.1
New version just for HSCI domain
All other domain information removed
